title: Lunar Citrus Crudo
summary: Atlantic kingfish bathed in yuzu kosho, bergamot pearls, and champagne air.
ritual: Infuse yuzu kosho with kefir lime leaves over low heat.
Charge champagne espuma with citrus bitters to aerate.
Crown with bergamot pearls, bronze fennel, and Oscietra pearls.
pairing: Krug Grande Cuvee, served 9C with bergamot zest mist.

title: Phoenix Bone Consomme
summary: Clarified aged duck broth, lion's mane consomme pearls, and saffron tonic.
ritual: Roast duck wings with miso caramel until lacquered.
Simmer 18 hours with golden beets, kombu, and green cardamom.
Clarify with egg white raft scented with jasmine tea.
Serve with lion's mane pearls, saffron tonic, and smoked salt.
pairing: Dom Perignon P2 2004 with saffron vapor.

title: Stellar Cacao Ganache
summary: Single-origin criollo cacao layered with tonka bean, bee pollen crunch, and fleur de sel.
ritual: Temper criollo cacao to 32C using marble pull technique.
Whisk in tonka creme anglaise and adaptogenic tincture.
Finish with bee pollen crunch, smoked fleur de sel, and 24k leaf.
Present beneath smoked cloche for aromatic reveal.
pairing: Barolo Chinato digestif with orange blossom hydrosol.
